text:
Tom Cruise Hired Dating Coach?

“ Tom Cruise Hired Dating Coach ”? : Tom Cruise did not enlist a dating mentor to enable him to win a sweetheart, notwithstanding a totally manufactured report. Talk Cop can dismiss this preposterousness. They say there is no fact to it.

According to the National Enquirer, the movie star lost her self-esteem after three divorces and a series of failed novels. To solve the problem, Cruise would have supposedly targeted a love guru. A supposed insider tells the magazine, “He’s getting all sorts of tips on how to get close to a woman and charm her.”

The dubious source of the output continues, “Tom is totally over the top, and his intensity may be despicable for women.” Tom was unlucky, his dates just do not come out, and even Tom must realize that he’s doing something wrong. “inexistent tipster adds, “Tom could use some tips on how to approach a woman and, most importantly, keep her happy.”

“ Tom Cruise” : Despite how ridiculous it all sounds, Gossip Cop even registered with a source close to Cruise, who laughed at the tabloid story before assuring us that “it’s not True.” The film star has kept her affection life private since her 2012 separation from Katie Holmes, however he has not swung to an expert mentor for help. This bit of fiction was evidently composed essentially on the grounds that the performer picks not to uncover their connections these days.

In addition, this would hardly be the first time that Gossip Cop had to debuting a false story about the movie star’s love life. We have just recently published the publication by False Claim of Cruise was romancing fellow Scientologist Elisabeth Moss. Prior to that, Gossip Cop dismissed Cruise’s account of “secret and romantic meetings” with Angelina Jolie.

Cruise has also been mistakenly linked to several of her top ladies in recent years. Gossip Cop has already corrected rumors about the movie star who is dating The Mummy, co-star Annabelle Wallis. We also overturned allegations that he was romantically involved with two of his missionaries: Impossible – Fall-to-co-stars, Rebecca Ferguson and Vanessa Kirby.
title: Tom Cruise Hired Dating Coach?
